title: Just updated to the new android on my Pixel XL and ive lost all text notification sound.
content: Just updated to the new android on my Pixel XL and ive lost all text notification sound. Only time it makes a sound is when i actively have my rext conversation open. Not inbox. Chat conversation. Then it makes noise. Otherwose vibrate only. Ive tried every fix on the internet. Vokime sliders, dnd settings, sound settings, messages app settings, notification settings. Someone please help. I cant have a phone thay doesnt make text notification sounds.
